trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this type is built top-down during XAML object graph creation.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個類型是否在 XAML 物件圖形建立期間由上而下建置。

trans-unit.source: Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when creating the object graph.
trans-unit.target: 由上而下是近似於 XAML 處理器的行為，建立物件圖形時的字眼。

trans-unit.source: When built top-down, a class is instantiated, attached to the parent, and then has its properties set.
trans-unit.target: 建置時由上而下，類別具現化，附加至父代，，然後有其內容設定。

trans-unit.source: Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 由上而下建構可避免多次叫用屬性變更處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Such handling will ripple up the object graph and therefore eliminating the multiple handler calls provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph.
trans-unit.target: 這類處理將 ripple 向上物件圖形，並因此排除多個處理常式呼叫提供物件圖形中啟動的效能最佳化。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.UsableDuringInitializationAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: In WPF XAML for [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)], top-down construction was built in to the XAML processing for certain classes.
trans-unit.target: 中的 WPF XAML[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]，由上而下建構已內建 XAML 處理特定的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.UsableDuringInitializationAttribute> attribute formalizes the reporting of the top-down behavior in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.UsableDuringInitializationAttribute>屬性 」 會正式制定報告中的由上而下行為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Defines whether the associated class is usable during initialization.
trans-unit.target: 定義是否可在初始化期間使用相關聯的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.UsableDuringInitializationAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.UsableDuringInitializationAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For the initial application you would typically apply as `[UsableDuringInitialization(true)]`, but you could then set `[UsableDuringInitialization(false)]` on a derived class to change the derived class reporting of the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 初始應用程式來通常套用為`[UsableDuringInitialization(true)]`，但您無法設定`[UsableDuringInitialization(false)]`上變更報表的行為在衍生的類別衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated class is usable during initialization.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，以指出是否可以在初始化時使用相關聯的類別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated class is usable during initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化時可使用相關聯的類別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
